column2: The Earth Kingdom has a special way of doing its government, formed over the many years it has existed. Do you choose to use this form of governing for your own realm?

The Fire Nation has a special way of doing its government, formed over the many years it has existed. Do you choose to use this form of governing for your own realm?
Form the United Republic of Nations
It's time to usher in a new era of the world. From the ashes of the old, the United Republic of Nations will be formed. A society of benders and non-benders all living and thriving in harmony.
